attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taran cheesemen was a soldier in the rifles. He was deployed to afghan in may of this year. While he was out there he fell ill and had to be brought back to the uk where he was diagnosed with cancer. He died on sunday 7th june. His death hasnt been recognised by the mod or the media in the official figures. Please place his name on the national war memorial and in the official death toll.

rejection.details: Please contact the MOD with your request in the first instance. If you have already done so, please resubmit but please be aware that generally, we do not accept petitions about individuals.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
